CWEs: CWE-209: Information Exposure Through an Error Message
description: The function sets the server timeout to 0, which means the server will hold the connection as long as the client is connected. This can lead to a Denial of Service (DoS) attack if an attacker holds many connections for a long time (CWE-400). Additionally, the function exposes potentially sensitive error information to users, which could be exploited to gain more information about the system (CWE-209).
